attributes.action: ensure pensioners recieve FREE access to  ramps, wheel chairs,  hand rails, bath joists
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: My auntie of 76 who has phenumonia and severed walking difficulties was refused a hand rail, basic ramp access and a wheel chair as she 'didn't meet the criteria' as she could still 'get down the step'..the social worker told her to 'blame Tony Blair'...My petition is to ensure that pensioners are provided with full help on a needs basis.
